content.question: Source: Esri The maps show residential neighborhoods in the Republic of Singapore. Which of the following individuals or organizations would be most likely to make a decision based on the spatial pattern shown on the maps?

choices.label: A person planning to move from a more rural area to a more urban area within Singapore
A business analyzing demographic change over time within its market area
An environmental advocacy group seeking to protect habitats of vulnerable species
A government agency seeking to promote equal opportunities across ethnicities
A multinational corporation identifying a location for a new factory

content.answer: A government agency seeking to promote equal opportunities across ethnicities

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Describe spatial patterns presented in maps and in quantitative and geospatial data.
